result.name: moj-extract-of-police-national-computer
result.notes: Extract of selected fields from the Police National Computer (PNC).

organization.name: ministry-of-justice
organization.title: Ministry of Justice
organization.description:
We work to protect the public and reduce reoffending, and to provide a more effective, transparent and responsive criminal justice system for victims and the public.

MOJ is a ministerial department, supported by 37 agencies and public bodies.

https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/ministry-of-justice

result.title: MoJ extract of Police National Computer

extras.value: The following statistical publications are made using data from this source: Proven Re-offending Quarterly; Local Adult Re-offending, Compendium of Re-offending Statistics and Analysis; Youth Justice Statistics; Criminal history tables in Criminal Justice Statistics Quarterly Bulletins, Offender Management Statistics, Conviction Histories of Offenders and Statistics on Women and the Criminal Justice System; Offences Brought To Justice (OBTJ) and Cautions tables in Criminal Justice Statistics Quarterly Update bulletins; Knife Possession Sentencing Quarterly Brief; Monthly update to the Justice Outcomes on the police.uk website.
